abstract: Planned Parenthood Federation of America president Cecile Richards apologizes for Dr Deborah Nucatola's lack of compassion when describing how affiliates provide tissue from aborted fetuses to researchers; abortion opponents posted year-old video of Nucatol's description online, inciting political storm that prompted Republicans in Congress and several states to order investigations.
lead_paragraph: The president of Planned Parenthood said Thursday that a staff member showed a lack of compassion when describing how affiliates provide tissue from aborted fetuses to researchers.

headline.main: Planned Parenthood Leader Apologizes for Video
headline.print_headline: An Apology Over a Video Involving Fetal Tissue

snippet: The president of Planned Parenthood said Thursday that a staff member showed a lack of compassion when describing how affiliates provide tissue from aborted fetuses to researchers.
